name: QuiVr Vanguard
description: QuiVr Vanguard is a bite sized intro to VR Archery in a polished, replayable, and magical environment. Grab your bow and some friends and jump into the game that was shaped by the VR community.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 980 Storage: 4 GB available space
